scripts.android:aab:staging: pnpm android:clean && react-native build-android --mode=staging && open android/app/build/outputs/bundle/staging
scripts.android:aab:prod: pnpm android:clean && react-native build-android --mode=release && open android/app/build/outputs/bundle/release
scripts.android:apk:staging: pnpm android:clean && cd android && ./gradlew assembleStaging && cd .. && open android/app/build/outputs/apk/staging
scripts.android:apk:prod: pnpm android:clean && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease && cd .. && open android/app/build/outputs/apk/release
scripts.ios:cp:staging: appcenter codepush release-react -a soya-energy/soya-energy-ios -d Staging -m false -p ios/SoyaEnergyApp/Info.plist --xcode-project-file=ios/SoyaEnergyApp.xcodeproj --sourcemap-output-dir ./build --output-dir ./build
scripts.ios:cp:prod: appcenter codepush release-react -a soya-energy/soya-energy-ios -d Production -x true -m false -p ios/SoyaEnergyApp/Info.plist --xcode-project-file=ios/SoyaEnergyApp.xcodeproj --sourcemap-output-dir ./build --output-dir ./build
scripts.android:cp:staging: appcenter codepush release-react -a soya-energy/soya-energy-android -d Staging -m false --sourcemap-output-dir ./build --output-dir ./build
scripts.android:cp:prod: appcenter codepush release-react -a soya-energy/soya-energy-android -d Production -x true -m false --sourcemap-output-dir ./build --output-dir ./build
scripts.cp:list: appcenter codepush deployment list -a soya-energy/soya-energy-ios && appcenter codepush deployment list -a soya-energy/soya-energy-android
scripts.cp:clean: appcenter codepush deployment clear -a soya-energy/soya-energy-ios Staging && appcenter codepush deployment clear -a soya-energy/soya-energy-android Staging
